properties.title: Spacious Two-Flat Duplex
properties.body: Well-designed two-flat building located in a serene environment. Each flat comes with a large living room, modern kitchen, and ensuite bedrooms. Suitable for both rental investment and family residence.
properties.author: Iyana Ipaja

properties.title: Luxury 4-Bedroom Smart Home in Miami
properties.body: This modern 4-bedroom villa features ocean views, a private pool, and a fully automated smart home system. The property has spacious living areas, marble floors, and an open kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances. Located just 10 minutes from Miami Beach.
properties.author: Miami, USA

properties.title: 3-Bedroom Duplex for Sale in Lekki Phase 1
properties.body: This modern 3-bedroom duplex offers spacious living areas, en-suite bathrooms, a fitted kitchen, and a private balcony. Located in a secure estate with 24-hour power supply and good road access — ideal for family living or investment.
properties.author: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos, Nigeria

properties.title: 2-Bedroom Apartment in Gwarinpa
properties.body: Newly built 2-bedroom apartment with POP ceiling, fitted kitchen, and ample parking space. Located in a gated community in Gwarinpa, close to major roads and shopping centers.
properties.author: Gwarinpa, Abuja

properties.title: Luxury 5-Bedroom Mansion in Banana Island
properties.body: This exquisite 5-bedroom mansion comes with a private elevator, swimming pool, cinema room, and rooftop lounge. It’s fully automated with cutting-edge smart home technology and premium interior finishing.
properties.author: Banana Island, Lagos, Nigeria

properties.title: Affordable Mini Flat in Ibadan
properties.body: Clean and affordable mini flat with tiled floors, borehole water supply, and prepaid electricity meter. Located in a peaceful environment close to University of Ibadan.
properties.author: Ibadan, Oyo State

properties.title: 4-Bedroom Detached Bungalow in Port Harcourt
properties.body: Fully fenced 4-bedroom detached bungalow with a spacious compound, modern kitchen, and tiled bathrooms. Located in a secure and quiet neighborhood in Port Harcourt.
properties.author: Port Harcourt, Rivers State

properties.title: Modern Beachfront Villa in Victoria Island
properties.body: Experience luxury living in this stunning beachfront villa featuring 6 ensuite bedrooms, a private infinity pool, rooftop terrace, and panoramic ocean views. Perfect for high-end buyers seeking comfort, privacy, and proximity to the city’s attractions.
properties.author: Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
